DataElement.preferredName: Case Biospecimen Pre-analytical Variables Program Requirement Release Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates whether the case met all BPV requirements and was released for shipment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Case Biospecimen Pre-analytical Variables Program Requirement Release
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A problem requiring investigation._A program designed to systematically investigate the effects of individual pre-analytical factors on the molecular profiles of biospecimens. The results of this study will be used to develop evidence-based protocols and best practices for optimal collection, processing, and storage of biospecimens._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._To make available; set free.

Property.preferredName: Biospecimen Pre-analytical Variables Program Requirement Release
Property.preferredDefinition: A program designed to systematically investigate the effects of individual pre-analytical factors on the molecular profiles of biospecimens. The results of this study will be used to develop evidence-based protocols and best practices for optimal collection, processing, and storage of biospecimens.:Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:To make available; set free.

Concepts.definition: A program designed to systematically investigate the effects of individual pre-analytical factors on the molecular profiles of biospecimens. The results of this study will be used to develop evidence-based protocols and best practices for optimal collection, processing, and storage of biospecimens.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
